member.name: IAudioSystemEffectsPropertyChangeNotificationClient.OnPropertyChanged
member.summary: Called by the system when an audio system effects property changes.
member.param: A value from the specifying the type of the property store that triggered the callback.
A structure identifying the property that changed.

member.name: IAudioSystemEffectsPropertyChangeNotificationClient
member.summary: A callback interface implemented by clients to receive notifications when audio system effect properties change.
